          <title>
            <string language="hu">Nagy kócsag</string>
            <string language="en">Great Egret</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Großer Reiher</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Grand Héron</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Egret Grande</string>

          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Nagy kócsag - hím (oldalról)</string>
            <string language="en">Great Egret - cock (from the side)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Nagy kócsag,  Casmerodius albus,  GÓLYAALAKÚAK,  CICONIIFORMES,  GÉMFÉLÉK,  ARDEIDAE,  Casmerodius,  </string>
            <string language="en">Great Egret,  Casmerodius albus,  STORK-SHAPED,  CICONIIFORMES,  HERONS,  ARDEIDAE,  Casmerodius,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Großer Reiher - Hahn (von der Seite)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Grand héron - robinet (du côté)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Egret grande - torneira (do lado)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Egret grande - rubinetto (dal lato)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεγάλος τσικνιάς - κόκκορας (από την πλευρά)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gran egret - martillo (de la cara)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Großer Reiher, Casmerodius albus, STORK-SHAPED, 
CICONIIFORMES, REIHER, ARDEIDAE, Casmerodius,</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Grand héron, albus de Casmerodius, STORK-SHAPED,

            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεγάλος τσικνιάς, albus Casmerodius, πελαργός-ΠΟΥ
